Zahraa is a hard worker and ambitious lady who is trying desperately to develop her business. Today she is acquiring a YOUTH loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to increase her business merchandise with new kinds of fruits and vegetables to attract more customers and satisfy their needs. 
Zahraa hopes to expand her business more in the future through opening a bigger shop to increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to increase her business merchandise with new kinds of fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Nelson Enrique

texts.es:
Lo que tiene en sus manos es el gran anhelo del señor Nelson un hombre de 41 años de edad, casado sin hijos que se dedica al transporte de motos, pero inicialmente comenzó trabajándole a otra persona.
Con la ayuda de interactuar quien le hablo del proyecto y los beneficios que puede obtener Nelson muy motivado y feliz quiere solicitar un préstamo para comprar su propia moto y emprender un nuevo camino como independiente en le cual se ha trazado sueños de compra de vivienda, mejorar condiciones de vida e hijos con su pareja.
Apoya a esté hombre, un impulso es lo que le falta para crear su empresa.
texts.en:
What he holds in his hands, is mister Nelson's great desire. He is a 41 year old man, married without children. He makes a living in motorcycle transportation, but he started working for another person. 

With the help of interactuar, who told him about the project and the benefits that he can obtain, Nelson is very motivated and happy to request a loan to buy his own motorcycle and to undertake a new path as independent in which he has outlined dreams of buying a house, improve living conditions and children with his partner. 

Help this man, one click is what is missing for him to create his own business.

loans.use: to buy his own motorcycle

loans.name: Gabriel Antonio

texts.es:
El señor Gabriel es un hombre emprendedor y aplicado, desde hace 6 años comenzó con un negocio de carnicería que hasta ahora le ha dado muy buenos resultados. El vive en el municipio de Tierra Alta con su esposa y sus 7 hijos.

El trabaja de lunes a sábado desde las 8:00 Am hasta las 5:00 Pm atendiendo un número de cliente medianamente alto.

El solicita un préstamo para comprar gran cantidad de carne y hueso al por mayor y de éste modo satisfacer los deseos de los clientes que le piden estos productos.

Esta ayuda le permitirá inyectar capital e impulso a su negocio y le brindara la jugosa oportunidad de mejorar sus ventas y sus ingresos familiares.
texts.en:
Gabriel is a resourceful man who started a butcher shop 6 years ago. So far it has given him very good results. He lives in the Tierra Alta municipality with his wife and 7 children. 

He works Monday to Saturday from 8:00AM to 5:00PM attending to his fairly high volume of clients. 

He is requesting a loan to buy a large quantity of meat and bones at whole sale and in this way satisfy the demands of his clients. 

This will allow him to inject capital into his business and will give him the opportunity to improve his sales and income for his family.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of meat and bones at whole sale.

loans.name: Walter De Jesus

texts.es:
Walter es un hombre dedicado, trabajador y responsable, que empíricamente inicio un negocio de reparación y venta de bicicletas de primera y segunda mano.
Dicho negocio lo inicio por necesidad económica y ha sido el sustento para él, vive solo pues se separó de su esposa pero nunca ha renunciado a su sueño de  comprar vivienda y cumplir esa promesa que un día se hizo cuando estaba casado.
Walter quiere solicitar un crédito para comprar bicicletas en mal estado, repararlas y ofertarlas a un precio justo para que personas de bajos recursos puedan acceder a ellas.
texts.en:
Walter is a dedicated, hardworking and responsible man who started a hands-on business of repair and sales of new and used bicycles.

He got into this work because of financial need, and he has earned a living by it. He lives alone since he separated from his wife, but he has never given up the dream of buying a home to fulfill the promise he once made himself when married.

Walter wants a loan to buy bikes in a state of disrepair so that he can fix them and resell at reasonable prices, thus giving low income people a chance to buy them.

loans.use: to buy bicycles in disrepair so that he can fix them and sell at more accessible prices.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy new tools and hair products for his barbershop.

loans.name: Maria Alejandra

texts.es:
Ella es María una mujer de gran corazón que con su negocio de confección a terceros ha sacado su familia adelante, la conforman su pareja y su pequeño amor su hija de tres años de edad, siempre ha querido progresar conseguir clientes y tener capacidad para producir bastante con el motivo de generar empleo a familiares que se encuentran desesperados y sin empleo.
Y son esos buenos deseos lo que la llevan a solicitar un crédito pues necesita comprar una maquina recubridora con la que podrá mejorar y optimizar sus tiempos de confección y lo más importante iniciar a ofertar un empleo que espera que se multiplique y consolidar un negocio en el que la preocupación por el trabajador sea el principal objetivo.
texts.en:
This is María, a woman with a big heart who, with her apparel making business she provides to third parties, has taken care of her family. Her family includes her partner and her little love, a three-year-old daughter.

María has always wanted to improve at getting more customers, and have the ability to produce enough in order to create jobs for relatives who are desperate and without work. These good intentions have motivated her to request a loan, since she needs to buy a coverstitch machine. 

With this machine, María will be able to improve and optimize her efficiency, and most importantly, begin to offer work that she hopes will multiply. In addition, she hopes to establish a business with its' main goal being a concern for its' workers.

loans.use: to buy a coverstitch machine to speed up her apparel production.

loans.name: Tafuta Self Help Group

texts.en:
In 2014, Tafuta Self Help Group joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa to be trained on savings and financial management. 

The person raising her hand in the photo is Dorcas, a member of this group. She is 29 years old, married and blessed with 2 children. She previously borrowed money to boost her vegetable farming from Hand in Hand Eastern Africa enterprise incubation fund and repaid promptly. She is borrowing from Kiva to buy fertilizers and pesticides. She hopes this will lead to a bounty harvest and thus more income. Dorcas will therefore be in a position to provide for family needs with ease. She is grateful to Kiva and all lenders for the financial support.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizer to help boost farming.

loans.name: Mwireri Magina Self Help Group

texts.en:
In 2014, a group called Mwireri Magina Self Help Group joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa to be trained on enterprise development and financial management. The person raising his hand is Noah. He is one of the group members. He is 24 years old and single.

Noah earns his living by running a car wash. He is borrowing from Kiva to buy a car washing machine. He hopes this will speed up his work and thus meet the high demand in his car wash. He looks forward to more income and thus being in a position to meet his needs such as food and clothing.
 
Noah is grateful to Kiva and all lenders for the help and support.

loans.use: to buy a car washing machine to help meet the rising demand for car wash service.

loans.name: Sanaa

texts.en:
Sanaa is a 39-year-old married mother of three children who started selling house-cleaning products a year ago to help her husband in meeting the needs and expenses of their family. Sanaa is working hard to develop her business, as she is known in her region for her good-quality products. 

Today, she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner AL Majmoua to increase her business merchandise with new requested products to satisfy her customers' needs. Sanaa hopes to expand her business more in the future to continue to provide her family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to increase her business merchandise with products requested by her customers

loans.name: Ameer

texts.en:
Ameer is a 24-year-old single man from Bethlehem city. He lives with his mother and brother in a small simple house. His mother is an employee where she gets a low income. Ameer opened a beauty salon two years ago in the city. It is a very good business and the demand is high.

Ameer took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to register in a new training for beauty salons to improve himself and his work. By taking this loan, Ameer will be able to improve his business and attract more clients.

Ameer appears in the photo.

loans.use: to register in a new training for beauty salons to improve himself and his work

loans.name: Bolkonoy

texts.en: Bolkonoy is a hardworking woman. She was born in 1967. She lives in a village. She is a widow with two children. She has done business for about ten years. Her son helps her to do business. She keeps livestock. She has a good practice in this sphere. After the death of her husband she decided to do business in order to feed the family. She has three big cattle now. She is planning to renovate her apartment. She needs support to buy building materials to renovate her apartment. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To buy building materials to renovate her apartment

loans.name: Baluku

texts.en:
Baluku is 30 years old and married with one child. He lives in Kasese, Uganda. Baluku has operated a retail shop with general merchandise since 2011. He distills waragi and also practices farming, growing crops such as maize, cotton and rice to earn additional income. Baluku has a dream of buying land for constructing a residential house. However,he is faced with the challenge of seasonality factors. 

Baluku wants money to buy soap, rice, sugar and other general merchandise for selling.

loans.use: to buy soap, rice, sugar and other general merchandise for selling.

loans.name: Muhayo

texts.en:
Muhayo is a hardworking woman. She was born in 1987. She is from northern part of Tajikistan and lives in a rural area. She is married and has three children. 

Muhayo has been keeping livestock for about six years. She has a good practice. She started her business with two large cattle. Now she has four large cattle. 

She is planning to have a circumcision ceremony for her son. She needs financial support for organizing the circumcision ceremony.

loans.use: To hold a circumcision ceremony

loans.name: Luis Anibal

texts.es:
El señor Luis es un veterano de mil batallas vividas a lo largo de su vida, vive en el municipio de Medellín con su hija de 30 años que tiene en la universidad.

El es un hombre muy trabajador y desde hace algún tiempo viene trabajando en el negocio de la preparación y venta de palomitas de maíz. 
Trabaja todos los días durante 5 horas solo.
Su negocio consiste en la preparación y venta de estos pasabocas. 

El ofrece sus productos de manera ambulante y cuando un cliente le hace un pedido, intenta satisfacer su necesidad a toda cabalidad. 
Manifiesta que es un negocio sencillo de realizar para su edad.

El solicita un préstamo para compra de un nuevo carrito que le permita trabajar de una manera más cómoda y eficaz.

El préstamo le dará la oportunidad de capitalizar su negocio y de darle un impulso considerable a su actividad, permitiéndole obtener recursos para la universidad de su hija.

Mejora la vida de este colombiano con un préstamo!
texts.en:
Mister Luis is a veteran of thousand battles lived throughout his life. He lives in the municipality Medellín with his 30 year old daughter, who is in university. 

He is a hardworking man and for some time now has been working in the business of preparation and sales of popcorn. He works every day for only 5 hours. His business consists of the preparation and sales of this snack. 

He offers his products ambulatory and when a client makes an order, he tries to satisfy his needs fully. He states that it is a simple business to do at his age.

He requests a loan to buy a new cart that will allow him to work more comfortably and efficient. The loan will give him the opportunity to capitalize his business and give his activity a considerable impulse. This will allow him to obtain more resources for the university of his daughter.

Improve the life of this Colombian with a loan!

loans.use: to buy a new food cart

loans.name: Jaime Alberto

texts.es:
Como se puede apreciar en el negocio del señor Jaime, su negocio carece de un techo y de paredes dificultades que le han significado perdidas pues cuando llueve muy fuerte se le moja la madera o los productos que tiene para entregar.
Esta necesidad tan recalcada ha llevado al señor Jaime a solicitar un crédito que lo necesita con mucha urgencia para poner en su negocio de ebanistería un techo y paredes y seguir produciendo para mantener a su pareja y su pequeño hijo de 6 años.
texts.en:
As can be seen in the photograph, Jaime's business lacks a roof and walls. These difficulties have caused him losses because when it rains very hard, his wood and products that are ready for delivery get wet. 

This very highlighted need has pushed Jaime to request a loan, which he needs urgently to build a roof and walls for his carpentry business. This way, he can continue producing in order to support his partner and his young son, who is 6 years old.

loans.use: to build a roof and walls for his carpentry business.

loans.name: Dolly De Jesus

texts.es:
Dolly es una persona muy simpática y siempre tiene una sonrisa para los clientes que visitan su tienda de abarrotes en zona rural del municipio de Medelllin.
Gracias a su carisma y buen humor se ha podido ganar el corazón y reconocimiento de las personas del sector que siempre prefieren visitar su tienda para adquirir sus productos.
Todos los días trabaja para darles una buena calidad de vida  a su hija de 17 años por la cual aspira a darle un excelente futuro.
Trabaja sola durante 10 horas todos los días.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de surtido de productos de la canasta familiar como granos, abarrotes, golosinas, bebidas, entre otros y de esta forma darle un impulso significativo a su negocio.
Ella guarda la esperanza de poder continuar con su negocio y así seguir impactando la vida de sus clientes a través de su buen servicio.
texts.en:
Dolly is a very nice person and always has a smile for the customers who visit her grocery store in the rural area of the town of Medellín.Thanks to her charisma and good humor she has been able to win the hearts and recognition of the the people in the area who always prefer to visit her store to purchase their products.

She works every day to give a good quality of life to her 17 year old daughter, and thus aims to give her an excellent future. She works alone for 10 hours every day. 

She is currently seeking a loan to buy an assortment of basic necessity products such as grain, food, candy, drinks, etc. and thus give a significant boost to her business

She keeps hoping to continue her business and thus continue to impact the lives of her customers through her good service.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of basic necessity products such as grain, food, candies, drinks, etc.

loans.name: Yanid Del Socorro

texts.es:
Yanid, a sus 42 años de edad, es casada y madre de 1 hija, a la que ha sacado adelante con arduo esfuerzo y dedicación. 
Durante mucho tiempo ha trabajado como comerciante independiente en su propio almacén de ropa; allí trabaja todos los días durante 10 horas y ha logrado generar los ingresos para solventar las necesidades familiares.

Expresa que su interés con el crédito es invertir en la compra de surtido al por mayor como blusas, jeans, pantalones de dama, entre otros para abastecerse lo suficiente y poder satisfacer los gustos de su clientela con la variedad que ofrecerá; esto le ayudará a mejorar las ventas  y los ingresos que recibe, además le hará frente a su mayor desafío que es sostenerse frente a la competencia desleal que se presenta en el sector. 

Yanid manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda y pagar la educación de su hija.
texts.en:
Yanid is 42 years old and married with 1 daughter, who she taken care of with arduous effort and dedication. For a long time, she has worked as an independent businesswoman in her own clothing store. She works there everyday for 10 hours, and she has managed to earn enough income to pay for her family's necessities.

Yanid expresses that her interest with this loan is to invest in an assortment of blouses, jeans, and women's pants at wholesale, among other items, to stock up sufficiently. She wants to be able to satisfy her customers with the variety that she will offer. This will help Yanid improve sales, along with the income she earns. In addition, she will confront her greatest challenge, which is to sustain her business in the face of the competition in her industry.

Yanid reveals that her greatest desire is to improve the conditions of her home and pay for the education of her daughter.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of blouses, jeans, and women's pants at wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more sheep for the family barn.

loans.name: Sophia

texts.en:
This is Sophia, 32 years old, married and blessed with three children. She joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa to be trained in savings and financial management. She does vegetable farming to earn a living.

She is borrowing from Kiva to buy fertilizer and pesticides. This will help boost her farming, thus obtaining more income from improved supplies. She hopes the loan will help her improve her living standards such as medical care and quality education for her children.

Sophia is grateful to Kiva and the entire lenders for the financial assistance.

loans.use: to buy more fertilizer and pesticides that will help boost farming.

loans.name: Matluba

texts.en:
Born in 1980, Matluba is an honest married mother of one child living in a village. Her husband and mother-in-law are helping her start a new business. 

Matluba has been working as a school teacher for about five months, but now she wants to both teach and have her own business. She wishes to plant and care for her own farm crops, which is why she is planning to lease land for planting. 

Matluba participated in a women's organization's "To Get Ahead" course which provided her with the skills to successfully grow her business. Now, Matluba requires the financial support to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers so she can start her new successful agriculture business.

loans.use: to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers so she can start a new farming business.

loans.name: Yeni Roxana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SEÑOR DE HUANCA-TERMINAL, él banco eta ubicado en el departamento de Cusco.
La socia  Yeni Roxana sigue trabajando en una empresa privada de transporte interprovincial, la socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para pagar los estudios de su hijo.
texts.en:
Yeni Roxana is a member of the Communal Bank “Señor de Huanca-Terminal”, which is located in the Department of Cusco. She continues to work for an interprovincial transport company. Yeni appreciates the loan that has been issued and promises to complete her payments according to the established terms. She is a responsible and industrious person. By working in this manner, she is able to help her family get ahead.

Yeni Roxana is requesting a loan in order to pay for her child’s studies.

loans.use: to pay for her child's educational expenses.

loans.name: Shohijahon

texts.en:
Shohijahon is a handsome man. He was born in 1989. He lives in a village. He is married and has one child. He and his wife have been doing a business for about ten years.

He is working abroad as an emigrant. His wife works on the land, planting cotton. They have not enough growth because of a less-rainy season.

Shohijahon is needed to renovate his apartment. He is planning to buy a ticket. He is asking for financial support for buying a ticket.

loans.use: to buy a ticket home.

loans.name: Tutumike Group

texts.fr: Madame NZIGIRE est présidente du groupe TUTUMIKE, âgée de 30 ans, mariée à un couturier et mère de 8 enfants tous étudiants. Elle est vendeuse des produits divers. Elle vient demander un crédit pour acheter 25kg de farine, 10 litres d’huile, 5 kilos de sucre et les braises. Elle compte avancer dans son commerce, renforcer son système d’épargne et payer les frais scolaires de ses enfants.
texts.en: Ms Nzigire is the chair of the Tutumike group, 30 years old. She is married to a tailor and has eight children, all of whom study. She is a vendor selling miscellaneous items. She just requested a loan to buy 25 kg [33 lbs] of flour, 10 liters of oil, 5 kg [11 kg] of sugar and charcoal. She plans to expand her business, bolster her savings and pay the tuition fees for her children.

loans.use: to buy 25 kg [33 lbs] of flour, 10 liters of oil, 5 kg [11 lbs] of sugar and charcoal.

loans.name: Nidia Rosa

texts.es:
Nidia es una vendedora de alimentos, muy simpática, responsable madre de 3 hijos todos ellos menores de edad y los que aspira darles un estudio que fue su principal motivación para iniciar este trabajo desde su hogar, donde aprovechando sus habilidades empíricas para la cocina realiza desayunos y almuerzos.
Al tener una buena acogida y ver que es muy capaz quiere arriesgarse pero no quiere tomar este riesgo sola, anhela hacerlo junto con  la corporación interactuar que aparte de ayudarle con un préstamo le brindara asesorías y acompañamientos para que su negocio sea un éxito.
Ella pide que la ayuden a comprar mesas plásticas, sillas, manteles, cubiertos y vajillas, y tal y como se imaginan Nidia tendrá su restaurante esperando mejorar sus condiciones de vida y darles cada días más cosas a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Nidia is a food vendor who is a very friendly and responsible mother of three children who are all minors. She hopes to give them an education, which was her main motivation for starting this work from her home. She can take advantage of her empirical abilities in the kitchen by making breakfast and lunch.

Having been well accepted and seeing that she is very capable she wants to take a risk, but she does not want to take that risk alone, she hopes to do it together with Interactuar. Apart from helping her with a loan, they give her advice and support her so that her business is a success.

She is asking for help to buy plastic tables, chairs, tablecloths, cutlery and silverware. As imagined, Nidia will have her restaurant, hoping to improve her living conditions and to give her children more things each day.

loans.use: to buy plastic tables, chairs, tablecloths, cutlery and silverware.

loans.name: Lina Marcela

texts.es:
Ella es Lina, una joven de tan solo 21 años de edad, que confundida se dejó embarazar de un hombre que la abandono y la dejo sola con su hijo, pero esta carismática mujer, lleva de voluntad y ganas de progresar, se dedica a la venta de ropa para mujer y con sus ganancias se mantiene ella y su pequeña de tan solo 1 mes de edad.
Su sueño es poder progresar y abrir un local comercial para esta más cerca de su hija pues debe realizar largos desplazamientos para vender sus productos.
Con un crédito quiere comprar un mayor número de mercancía que se la dejarían más económica, y así, poner en pie sus sueños viéndose en 5 años sonriéndole a un cliente por una venta realiza en su propio local comercial.
texts.en:
She is Lina, a young woman of only 21 years old, who, confused, let herself become pregnant of a man who abandoned her and left her alone with her child. 

But this charismatic woman brings with her a will and desire to progress. She makes a living selling women's clothes and with the earnings she sustains herself and her small girl who is only 1 month old. Her dream is to be able to progress and open a commercial place in order to be closer to her daughter, as now she needs to travel far to sell her products. 

With a loan she wants to buy a larger amount of merchandise that they will sell her cheaper and as such be able to put into place her dreams, seeing herself in five years smiling at a client for a closed deal in her own commercial place.

loans.use: to buy clothing for ladies, blouses, coats, accessories

loans.name: George

texts.en:
George used his previous loan to buy general merchandise to sell such as toothbrushes and cooking oil. He is a 40-year-old married father of 2 children living in Kasese, Uganda. 

George operates a retail shop selling general merchandise. He also farms and owns a motorcycle transport business in order to earn income to meet his daily needs. 

George dreams of educating his children and growing his business into a wholesale operation. However he faces the challenges of limited capital and bad debtors. 

George is requesting a loan to buy sugar, salt, and other general merchandise to sell.

loans.use: to buy sugar, salt, and other general merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Juan Alberto

texts.es:
Juan es un hombre muy trabajador y organizado, se gana la vida prestando el servicio de transporte de personas en su moto a través de las veredas del municipio de Tamesis posibilitando el desplazamiento de la comunidad hasta las distintitas áreas del municipio.

Es un hombre amable, servicial y muy emprendedor, es soltero y sostiene a su madre a la cual siempre ha procurado ofrecerle la mejor vida posible.

Solicita un préstamo para comprar una moto modelo 2014 y asi cambiar la que tiene antigua ya que es su único medio de trabajo.

Con este crédito podrá mejorar las condiciones de su trabajo y podrá continuar prestando su servicio con total seguridad y sin poner en riesgo su vida ni la de sus clientes.

Apoya a Juan con un préstamo hoy!
texts.en:
Juan is a very hardworking and organized man. He makes his living by providing the service of transporting people on his motorcycle through the villages of the municipality of Tamesis, thus enabling the community to have mobility throughout the different areas of the municipality.

He is a friendly, helpful, and very enterprising man. He is single and supports his mother, for whom he has always tried to provide the best life possible.

He requests a loan to buy a 2014 model motorcycle, and thereby replace his old one, since it is his only means of work. With this loan, he can improve the conditions of his work, and may continue to provide service safely, without risking his life, or that of his customers.

Support Juan with a loan today!

loans.use: to buy a 2014 model motorcycle and thereby replace his old one

loans.name: Zahida

texts.en:
Zahida is a 43-year-old married woman. The man shown in the photo beside Zahida is her husband, who is a driver by profession and provides transportation services with his three-wheeled rickshaw. 

Zahida's husband has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family's expenses. But now their rickshaw requires proper maintenance to keep it functional for its routine. 

For this reason, Zahida has applied for a 50,000 PKR loan on behalf of her husband. He wants to buy new tires and spare auto parts for his vehicle. This will help him drive smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers. 

Zahida is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy new tires and spare auto parts.

loans.name: Nesrine

texts.en: Nesrine is a 20-year-old single lady. She lives in Zarqa`a. Now she is in her third year in university. Nesrine`s father retired from work. Because of the rise in tuition plus the graduation fees, Nesrine  had to request a loan to help her cover the fees and pay her graduation fees.

loans.use: To cover the fees and pay her graduation fees.

loans.name: Noeline

texts.en:
Noeline is the mother of two children who are both going to school. They live in Kyenjojo, Uganda. She deals in clothes and also teaches to supplement her income, a business she started for income generation. She intends to use the loan to buy clothes to sell.

Despite the challenges her business faces, such as changing fashions, which cause the clothing to lose value if not sold on time, her dream is to build a house for her family.

loans.use: To use the loan to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en: Ruth is 35 years old, married and lives in Fort Portal, Uganda. She is in the transport business and this is her main source of income. She faces challenges which include low capital and bad roads that cause constant mechanical breakdowns. Despite those problems, she has hopes of owning many vehicles in the future. Ruth is requesting this loan to complete making payments on a vehicle.

loans.use: to finish paying for a vehicle.

loans.name: Firdos

texts.en:
Firdos is a 47-year-old vigorous, married mother of 2 children. She has had her hand-embroidery business for many years. She knows the art of making beautiful embroidered patterns with beads and pearls. She is zealous about her work, and client demand is strong. 

Business challenges, combined with family expenditures, frustrate Firdos nearly every day. Her husband does not earn enough on his own to support his family well. But Firdos’s embroidery patterns are very popular on her street, and she is the best earning resource in her household.  

So Firdos wants to grow her business. She has requested a 60,000 PKR loan to buy large quantities of raw materials such as thread, sequins, and pearls to consistently meet her increasing customer demand. She will be able to not only earn more profits but also fulfill her dream of opening her own shop in the market to display her work.

loans.use: to buy large quantities of raw materials such as thread, sequins, and pearls so she can consistently meet her increasing customer demand and earn more profits.

loans.name: Delfi

texts.es:
Delfi es una mujer muy creativa y hábil de 29 años de edad, madre de dos hombres de 14 y 17 año de edad, se dedica a realizar artesanías con fibras naturales, en un negocio que se lo enseño a realizar su madre y que ha pasado de generación en generación.
Es una persona de muy bajos recursos, que enfrenta problemas de falta de capital e inseguridad en su sitio de trabajo, pero sigue en pie realizando la profesión que está en sus venas y solo necesita un pequeño impulso, un préstamo para comprar fibras naturales para realizar canastas, sillas y otros productos que esta pro definir.
texts.en:
Delfi is a very creative and skilled 29-year-old woman. She is the mother of two men, ages 14 and 17. She works making handicrafts with natural fibers, in a business that her mother taught her how to do and that has passed from generation to generation. 

She is a person of very low income who faces problems related to a lack of capital and insecurity in her work place. However, she continues on her feet, carrying out the work that is in her veins. She only needs a small push, a loan to buy natural fibers to make baskets, chairs, and other products that she determines.

loans.use: to buy natural fibers to make baskets and chairs.

loans.name: Olga Maria

texts.es:
Ella es Olga, es una mujer soltera de 54 años de edad que no tiene una persona quien le ayude, pero su carácter y perseverancia de salir siempre adelante son la que la tienen aquí, en su foto se refleja su gran deseo de tener una tienda, y por ello quiere solicitar un crédito pues se ven en tan solo un mes ya vendiendo productos de la canasta familiar.
Esta tienda significara el sustento de ella de ahora en adelante pues se encuentra sin empleo y por su edad es difícil que consiga, por ello en base a unos ahorros que tiene y a un crédito que solicita quiere iniciar su tienda de abarrotes.
Con el dinero comprara, congelador, vitrinas, estanterías, adecuara el local y el surtido en productos de refrigeración, abarrotes, dulces, granos, frituras, galletería etc.
texts.en:
This is Olga, a 54-year old single woman who doesn't have anyone to help her, but her character and perseverance for always getting ahead are what have gotten her here. The photo reflects her great desire to have a store. That is why she wants to apply for a loan, because in just a month she is already selling basic family necessities.

This store will mean her sustenance from here on out, because she doesn't have a job and at her age, it is difficult to find one. That is why, with some savings that she has and a loan for which she is applying, she wants to start her grocery store.

With the money, she will buy a freezer, display cases, and shelves, to set up her store and stock it with products that require refrigeration, groceries, sweets, grains, fried snacks, cookies, etc.

loans.use: to buy a freezer, display cases, and shelves to fix up her shop.

loans.name: Gabriel De Jesus

texts.es:
Gabriel ha sido un hombre muy dedicado, siempre pendiente del cuidado de su familia; desde siempre le ha gustado trabajar como comerciante independiente, comenzó a vender elementos de reciclaje desde hace 10 años, pues es responsable de llevar la carga económica del hogar. 
Trabaja con un familiar todos los días en su negocio durante 14 horas y encuentra en su labor la ventaja de poder estar pendiente de su familia, al mismo tiempo que logra ser productivo como comerciante.

Actualmente solicita el crédito para comprar surtido al por mayor de elementos de reciclaje para comercializar, pues es una gran oportunidad en esta época del año, esto le permitirá abastecerse con más capital para satisfacer la demanda que se incrementa, dando como resultado la obtención de mejores ingresos para su familia.
Gabriel manifiesta que su mayor deseo es poder seguir apoyando económicamente a su familia y dar educación a todos sus hijos, para verlos convertirse en profesionales y tengan un futuro próspero y exitoso.
texts.en:
Gabriel has been a dedicated man, always pending for the care for his family; He has always liked working like an independent merchant. He started selling recycling components 10 years ago, as he is responsible for the economic care of his home. He works with a relative every day in his business for 14 hours. He finds it to be an advantage in his work to be able to be pending for his family and at the same time be able to be productive as a merchant.

Currently he requests a loan to buy an assortment of recycling components wholesale for commercialization, because it is a great opportunity in this time of the year. This will allow him to stock up with more capital to satisfy the growing demand, which will result in obtaining a better income for his family. 

Gabriel states that his greatest desire is to be able to continue supporting his family economically and give an education to all his children, in order to see them become professionals and have a prosperous and successful life.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of recycling components wholesale for commercialization

loans.name: Joel De Jesus

texts.es:
Joel es un hombre de 58 años de edad, toda su vida ha sido empleado, estando a las órdenes de otros, en el año 2010 termino contrato y no lograba conseguir trabajo, pero en medio de su meditación y buscando que hacer surgió una idea de iniciar un negocio empírico y busco algo que fuera fácil y rápido  de implementar, de hay surgió su idea de vender arepas de queso, que es el producto que se puede ver en la foto en pocas palabras un comida rápida.
Gracias a este negocio que ya tiene un recorrido de 4 años ha podido generar los recursos para sus 4 hijos y su pareja y sigue en pie sonriendo y siendo feliz compartiendo con sus clientes.
Joel por su ajustado presupuesto y modestos ingresos no ha podido realizar un mantenimiento a su carro de comidas, pero con la ayuda de una entidad legal y certificada como Interactuar que le ayudara con un préstamo, el cual invertirá en la reparación de su vehículo, comprar queso y maíz para seguir con sus productos.
texts.en:
Joel is a man of 58 years old. His whole life he has been employed, being at the command of others. In 2010 his contract ended and he was unable to find a job. But, in the middle of his meditation and looking for what to do, an idea came to him to start an empirical business. He looked for something that was easy to do and quick to implement. From this, came the idea to sell cheese arepas (maize loafs), which is the product that can be seen in the photo; in other words, a fast food. 

Thanks to this business that he has already been doing for 4 years, he has been able to generate the resources for his 4 children and his partner and he continues standing smiling and happy sharing with his clients. 

Joel with his tight budget and modest income has not been able to perform maintenance on his food cart. But, the legal and certified entity like Interactuar will help him with a loan, which he will invest in repairing his vehicle, buy cheese and maize to continue with his produce.

loans.use: to perform maintenance on his food cart, buy arepas and cheese

loans.name: Nadia

texts.en: Nadia is a 30-year-old married woman. The man shown in the photo is Nadia’s husband who is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine. For this reason, Nadia has applied for a loan of 40,000 PKR, for her husband. He wants to replace new tires on his auto body for his vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers. Nadia is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to replace new tires on his auto body.

loans.name: Farzona

texts.en: Farzona is 23 years old and has a husband and one son. She lives in the Yavan district, where she is known as a very hardworking woman. She received only a secondary school education and today earns a living by sewing national women`s dresses. She has been involved in this line of work for three years now, and learned the trade from her mother. Her work helps Farzona to support her family, and she earns additional money by raising animals. She is requesting a loan to buy fabrics to use when sewing modern dresses and to attract new clients. She is very grateful for the support she receives from Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to buy fabrics to sew modern dresses.

loans.name: Miriam

texts.en: Miriam used the previous loan to finish constructing her rental houses. She is a hardworking 36-year-old woman living in Fort Portal, Uganda with 2 children, with a business of rental houses. She faces the challenges of having low capital; however, her business plan is to have more rentals to earn more income. Miriam needs a loan to buy cement and sand and to pay for labour.

loans.use: to buy cement and sand and to pay for labour

loans.name: Cesar

texts.es:
Gracias a una clases el señor Cesar se convirtió no solo en el  electricista del barrio, si no que este conocimiento le dio pie para tener su propio negocio y ser independiente, es un hombre muy alegre que tiene servicio en su taller y a domicilio, Cesar es un hombre casado muy responsable y padre de un hijo de 13 años su campeón lo alienta y lo motiva mucho en el deporte.
 Cesar solicita un crédito para la compra de repuestos eléctricos, la razón es que los comprara en cantidad ya que tiene que hacer un desplazamiento muy considerable para ir donde su proveedor de confianza.
Con  la ayuda de este crédito tendrá las existencias suficientes para trabajar este primer trimestre del año donde aspira y se proyecta realizar adecuaciones a su casa con el dinero que gane.
texts.en:
Thanks to some classes, Cesar not only became the electrician of his neighborhood, but this knowledge gave him the footing to have his own business and be independent. He is a very happy man who has services in his shop and his home. Cesar is a very responsible married man and father of a 13-year-old son, his champion who he encourages and motivates a lot in sports. 

Cesar requests a loan in order to buy electronic replacement parts. The reason is that he will buy them in quantity since he has to make a very considerable trip in order to reach his trusted supplier. 

With the help of this loan, he will have sufficient supplies to work this first trimester of the year, in which he aspires and projects to achieve adaptations to his house with the money he earns.

loans.use: to buy electronic replacement parts.

loans.name: Julius

texts.en:
Julius is a married father of one child living in Kyenjojo, Uganda. 

Julius is very hardworking, dealing in the cattle trade as his main source of income. He is based in a rural area with both local and urban clients. He has been operating his business for ten years, though he also earns additional income from brick making. 

Julius began his business in order to generate income, and he has hopes of establishing another business to increase his income. The main challenge he faces is price fluctuations. 

The purpose for Julius's loan is to buy more cows to sell.

loans.use: to buy more cows to sell.

loans.name: Sandra Patricia

texts.es:
Un gran esfuerzo está realizando la señora Sandra para cumplir un deseo y anhelo el cual es tener un negocio propio, con algunos ahorros, materiales recogidos de la calle, y algunos obsequios de sus vecinos ha construido una cochera para albergar cerdos.
Sandra a sus 38 años de edad es madre de 3 hijos y como su preocupación es que estudien, está motivada para iniciar y tener una entrada de dinero que le permita por lo menos ilusionarse en que si es posible darle ese derecho a sus hijos.
Solicita un crédito para la compra de, cerdos, una cerda de cría y un cerdo de engorde, los cuales iniciara su ruta hacia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Sandra is making a big effort to achieve her wish and desire to have her own business. With some savings, materials collected from the street and some presents from her neighbours, she has built a shed to house pigs.
Sandra is 38 years old and has 3 children. As she worries about them being able to study, she is motivated to get started and to have an income which will allow her to at least have the hope that it is possible to give them this right.
She is asking for this loan to buy pigs, one to breed and one to fatten up. These will start her on track to a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy pigs, one breeding sow and one pig to fatten up.

loans.name: Miriam

texts.es:
Miriam es una adorable, presentable, aseada, comprometida y responsable mujer de 61 años de edad que desde el año 1984 tiene su negocio de confección directa, a baja escala pues la responsabilidad de mantener a su hija siempre fue primera.
Su negocio fue trasmitido de herencia pues su madre también lo empleo y se llenó de orgullo cuando su hija mostro pasión por este, su gran sueño que no quiere renunciar a este es junto con su esposo tener un hogar propio para dejarle alguna herencia a su pequeña.
Para lograr este cometido tiene que mejorar enormemente sus ganancias y lo hará produciendo más y mejores prendas para lo que necesita tela, hilos, nylon y accesorios, que de momento no cuenta capital para comprarlos por ello solicita un crédito esperando tener apoyo y que no se dejen guiar por las apariencias pues a pesar de ser una mujer de la tercera es muy trabajadora y responsable con sus cuentas.
texts.en:
Miriam is a lovely, neat, clean-cut woman, 61 years old. Responsible and committed, she has kept since 1984 a business creating made-to-measure garments. It has been so far a small-scale business because her top responsibility always was to care for her daughter. 

Miriam inherited this business from her mother, who did this work and was filled with pride at her daughter's passion for the same. 

Her biggest dream, which she doesn't want to let go of, is to have her own home together with her husband, so that she can leave a legacy to her child.

To reach this commitment, she must significantly increase her profits, and this she will do by producing more and better garments.

Miriam does not have capital to purchase the fabrics, threads, nylon, and accessories needed for her work. This is why she is requesting a loan, seeking support, in the hope that lenders will look beyond her age to see a very hard-working, accountable woman.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics to promote her own tailoring.

loans.name: Odai

texts.en:
Odai lives with his mother in Zarqa, Jordan. He is an example of an ambitious and positive man. 

Odai is divorced with one child. His relationship with his ex-wife was not good, and they faced many problems, which affected both him and his child.  

Odai is 27 years old and works in a food factory. He likes what he does, but he wants to start a totally new life. So he has decided to complete his advanced studies, and, hopefully, this will be a good change for him and his child. 

Therefore, Odai has asked for an education loan in order to cover the cost of his university fees.

loans.use: to cover the cost of his university fees.

loans.name: Musarat

texts.en: Musarat  is a 56-year-old, married woman. She has three children. She is a strong and healthy lady who, for the past many years, has been running a cloth buy-and-sell business. She buys cloth in various fabrics, different colors and designs from the market at wholesale rates and then sells them to the people of her community. She has a varied customer base and is able to earn enough through her business. Now Musarat has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR  to buy a wide variety of cloth in different colors and designs to attract more customers and expand her business. She hopes this new loan will be a good experience. Musarat expects a boost in her earnings with the loan and she plans to spend part of her profits helping her family members.

loans.use: to buy a wide variety of cloth in different colors and designs to attract more customers and expand her business.

loans.name: Victor Jaid

texts.es:
Víctor es un veterano de 48, responsable, comprometido, orgulloso padre de 4 hijas dos de ellas menores de edad, y las otras dos adolescentes.
Es propietario de una panadería que tiene desde el 1998, y que significado el progreso de sus familiares más allegados, pro la responsabilidad de mantener a sus hijas no ha tenido la oportunidad de ponerle atención a su negocio, y es con la ayuda de un crédito que realiza unas adecuaciones que desde años necesita y también invertirá en la compra de un horno.
Este crédito significara un gran impulso  pues producirá más panes, con su objetivo para comprar vivienda.
texts.en:
Víctor is a 48-year-old veteran who is the responsible, committed, and proud father of four daughters, two of whom are very young, and the other two are teenagers. 

He is the owner of a bakery that he has had since 1998, and which is the source of the success of his immediate family. Due to his responsibilities in raising his daughters he has not paid so much attention to his business. With the help of a loan he will be able to make some repairs that the bakery has been in need of for a number of years, and he will also invest in an oven. This loan will be a big boost to his business and will allow him to produce more bread, his goal being to buy a house one day.

loans.use: to make construction improvements and to buy an oven so he can bake more bread.

loans.name: Manzooran

texts.en:
Manzooran is 40 years old and a married woman who has run a milk selling business for many years with the help of her husband. She has buffaloes for milking. She sells the milk in her area. Her business is doing well enough to pay for her family’s expenses. Manzooran has two children. She is a dedicated mother and wants the best for her children. 

Manzooran has taken many loans from the Kashf Foundation. Now, she has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR to purchase one more buffalo to increase her milk sales to earn a good amount of income to fulfill her dream of providing better living conditions to her children.

loans.use: to purchase one more buffalo to increase her milk sales to earn a good amount of income

loans.name: Ana Rosa

texts.es:
Un gran ejemplo de vida son las personas del campo, que son muy felices con tan poco, pues tiene con todos los recursos y la belleza que la madre naturaleza tiene para ellos. Uno de estos sonrientes agricultores es la señora Ana, es una madre de 5 hijos, trabajadora, soñadora, que se dedica a la producción de leche y tiene un principio muy hermoso el cual es que al  estar a punto de morir una de sus vacas prefiere enterrarlas que sacrificarlas para carne.
Los campesinos son los responsables de producir el alimento que disfrutan en la comodidad de su hogar miles de personas y por esta razón hay que aplaudirle y ayudarles para que sigan con su grandiosa labor.
Ana quiere solicitar un apoyo para ajustar para la compra de dos vacas lecheras pues algunas de sus vacas están en fase terminal.
texts.en:
A great example in life are people from the country, who are so happy with so little, because they have all the resources and beauty that mother nature gives them. One of these smiling farmers is Ana. She is the mother of 5 children, hardworking and a dreamer. She makes her living in milk production and has a very beautiful principal, which is when one of her cows is about to die, she prefers to bury it than to sacrifice it for meat.

The farmers are the ones responsible for producing the food that thousands of people enjoy in the comfort of their homes. That is why we must applaud them and help them so that they can continue with their magnificent work.

Ana wants to apply for a loan in order to buy two dairy cows, because one of her cows is in its last days.

loans.use: to buy two dairy cows.

loans.name: Al Daly Group

texts.en:
Nadia is the featured borrower of Al Daly group. She is working closely with the other group members to acquire a loan from Kiva's partner, Al Majmoua, because they have always been neighbors and friends, and seek to develop and improve their beloved families' living.

Nadia is the 45-year-old married mother of five children who has worked as a hairdresser from her house for fourteen years. Her goal is to help her husband increase their income and cover their children's expenses.

Nadia is a hardworking woman and used a previously acquired loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to establish a small grocery store, which she has been developing carefully to make sure that one day she can expand to a supermarket.  She has a very good reputation in her region, and has requested a new loan from Kiva's Field partner Al Majmoua's to increase her business merchandise with special offer products, especially for the current winter. 

Nadia is the first lady from the left with a black veil. As for the other group members, Fatima is the married mother of four children who works in baking and has made bread in her house for the last eleven years. She will use her portion of this loan to open a car wash to increase her family's income. She is the person on the right. 

Rodayna, the single lady at the center, will use her portion of the loan to pay increasing university tuition fees, and develop her beauty products home-based sales business.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell.

loans.name: Medard

texts.en:
Medard is a 35-year-old hardworking married man with two children living in Kamwenge, Uganda. He raises  livestock rand earns additional income from farming to earn a living. 

Prolonged droughts hinder his vision of becoming rich. However he is determined to take his business to greater heights. Medard requests a loan to buy more goats to sell.

loans.use: to buy goats.

loans.name: Ubumwe Group

texts.en:
Ubumwe is a group led by 26-year-old Lucie. She has been a group leader for 3 years. The group's name means “Unity” in English. The group members sell different items and are in business to changing their living standards.

Lucie has had  a shop for 3 years.  She would like to buy salt, sugar, and cooking oil. The profits from the business will be used to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy salt, sugar, and cooking oil.

loans.name: Fayzali

texts.en:
Fayzali is a handsome man who lives in a rural area. He is married and has one child. He studies in an academy.

His family has an agricultural business. Fayzali helps his mother in the business. She is an entrepreneur who keeps, buys and sells livestock.

Fayzali is a good student and this is his last year of studying. He does not have enough capital to pay his tuition and needs financial support to do so.

loans.use: to pay for his tuition

loans.name: Enilda Bernarda

texts.es:
Enilda es una madre soltera muy capaz, con los pantalones bien puestos que en su vida que llega recorrido nunca ha necesitado de otras personas, ella misma se genera sus ingresos con la ayuda de sus facultades de la cocina que aprendió de su madre, realiza los alimentos como desayunos y almuerzos y sale y los distribuye.
Es madre de 4 hijos los cuales levanto y crío sola, pero al tener tantas responsabilidades no ha tenido buen capital para pensar en mejorar su negocio o incluso montar un restaurante que es su principal sueño y deseo, pues se siente un poco cansada.
Solicita un crédito para realizar sus almuerzos, frutas, arroz, carne, panes, verduras, granos, etc., son los alimentos que usa más regularmente.
Con la ayuda de este crédito podrá vender más para seguir pagando la educación de sus muchachos.
texts.en:
Enilda is a very capable single mother who has been self-sufficient in life, since she has never had to rely on other people.

She makes her living with the help of her cooking abilities, that she learned from her mother. She makes meals, such as breakfast and lunch, and sells and distributes them. 

She is the mother of 4 children, whom she supports and raises by herself. Having so many responsibilities, she has not had adequate funds to think about improving her business, or even set up a restaurant, which is her main dream and desire, because she feels a bit tired.

She requests a loan to buy her lunch supplies; fruits, rice, meat, breads, vegetable, grains, etc. These are the foods that she uses most regularly. With the help of this loan, she can sell more to continue to pay for the education of her kids.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of fruits, rice, meat, breads, vegetables, and grains; which are the supplies used the most

loans.name: Gloria Marcela

texts.es:
Gloria es una madre muy casera, es cabeza de familia y muy preocupado por su pequeña de 6 años de edad, al no tener una persona que le ayude tuvo que buscar una alternativa para cuidar su hija y al mismo tiempo producir recursos, una tarea de verdad muy difícil, ante la desesperación inicio en su casa un negocio de arreglo de uñas.
Aunque su negocio es muy casero, ha tenido buena acogida por el público ya que por sus precios justos y excelentes trabajos sus clientes la buscan cada vez más.
Gloria pensando a futuro quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de esmaltes de uñas, una silla para realizar manicura y pedicura, e ir formando su propio local comercial poco a poco.
texts.en:
Gloria is a very home-loving woman. She is the head of her family and is very concerned for her young 6-year-old daughter. Not having a person to help her, she had to find an alternative to care for her daughter and at the same time produce resources, a very difficult task. In the face of desperation, she started a business in her house fixing nails. 

Although her business is very home-based, it has been well received by the public. Her customers keep coming back because of the fair prices and excellent work. 

Gloria, thinking to the future, wants to request a loan to buy nail polish and a chair to do manicures and pedicures, and to form her own commercial shop little by little.

loans.use: to buy nail polish and a chair to do manicures and pedicures.

loans.name: Leidy Yuliana

texts.es:
Comprar lociones, cremas y bisutería son las razones que llevan a la señora Leidy necesita para impulsar su negocio, ya que por la falta de capital no ha podido realizar los proyectos que se ha trazado  como lo son promocionar sus productos en pueblos y ofertar puerta a puerta pero para ello necesita existencias.
Con la ayuda de un crédito quiere abastecerse y tener existencias suficientes para salir a la calle y buscar una mejor calidad de vida para ella y sus dos hijos, continuar pagando la escuela de las niños y un día consolidar un almacén.
texts.en:
In order to boost her business, Leidy needs to buy lotions, creams, and costume jewelry. Due to lack of capital she has not been able to buy the stock she needs to promote her products in the villages and sell door-to-door.

With the help of a loan she will be able to stock her business with enough product to sell in the street and attain a better quality of life for herself and her two children, continue paying for school for the children, and to one day to build a shop.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of body lotions, hair products, perfumes, and pajamas to sell in villages.

loans.name: Nelsi Esthela

texts.es:
Nelsi es una persona muy trabajadora que gracias a su esfuerzo diario ha logrado sacar adelante a su hija brindándole una educación de buena calidad.
Nelsi vive en unión libre con su pareja y desde hace mucho tiempo comenzó a vender productos de uso personal a través de catalogo, con gran esfuerzo a superado muchos problemas que se le han presentado.
Actualmente Nelsi tiene unos muy buenos pedidos por parte de sus clientes y debido a que no cuenta con un gran capital busca un préstamo para comprar productos de uso personal y responder a los grandes pedidos que tiene de sus clientes.
Le dedica 4 horas diarias a su negocio.
Su mayor sueño es salir adelante con su negocio y desde este poder ofrecerles a su hija una buena calidad de vida y una mejor estabilidad económica, sabe que de la mano de Interactuar podrá lograrlo.
texts.en:
Nelsi is a very hard-working person. As a result of the effort that she puts forth every day, she has been able to move her daughter forward, giving her an education of good quality. Nelsi lives in a common-law marriage with her partner. A very long time ago, she started selling personal use products via catalog. With great effort, she has overcome many problems that she has encountered.

Currently, Nelsi has some very good orders from her customers. Since she does not have great capital, she is requesting a loan to buy personal use products so that she can respond to the large orders that she has from her customers. Nelsi dedicates 4 hours per day to her business. Her greatest dream is to move forward with her business in order to give her daughter a good quality of life and better economic stability. She knows that she can achieve this with the help of Interactuar.

loans.use: to buy personal use products.

loans.name: Oliverio De Jesus

texts.es:
Él es Oliveiro un hombre de 30 años que por su difícil niñez y juventud no puedo acceder a una educación, sus padres siempre le enseñaron a valerse por sí mismo y de esas enseñanzas fue que le surgió la idea de ser su propio Jefe teniendo un negocio que conociera y pudiera sacar a delante.
Se dedica a la distribución de Madera, la cual es muy común en dicha zona pues la cantidad de casas de madera excede por mucho a las casas construidas por material.
Oliveiro solicita un impulso para comprar madera, este crédito le permitirá tener existencia suficiente para cubrir un pedido.
Oliveiro busca mejorar sus condiciones de vida, dejar de ser pobre, y traer al mundo hijos en condiciones de vivienda y económica óptimas.
texts.en:
This is Oliveiro, he is 30 years old and because of his difficult childhood and youth he was not able to get an education. His parents always taught him to value himself how he is and it was from these lessons that the idea came to him to be his own boss, having a business that he knew and could progress in. He earns a living distributing wood which is common in his area as the number of houses made from wood outnumbers by a lot the amount built from other materials.
Oliveiro is asking for this loan to buy wood, this loan will allow him to have enough stock to cover an order.
Oliveiro is looking to improve his living conditions, stop being poor, and bring children into the world in good living and economic conditions.

loans.use: to buy wood for his business.

loans.name: Juan Ricardo

texts.es:
Juan es un joven de 24 años de edad que por necesidad económica inicio un negocio de Barbería, siempre siguiendo su instinto de vocación al trabajo independiente, para realizar este trabajo tomo capacitaciones y a pesar de la inseguridad en el sitio de trabajo debido a bandas delincuenciales sigue trabajando para pagar la educación de sus hijos, llevar el alimento al hogar y mejorarlo.
Solicita un crédito para realizar algunas adecuaciones a su local y comprar una silla de barbero pues piensa emplear a una persona para ir creciendo a pasos pequeños pero seguros.
texts.en:
Juan is a young man 24 years of age who, out of economic necessity, started a barbershop business, still following his desire to work independently.

In order to do this work, he took training classes, and despite insecurity at his place of work due to delinquent gangs, he continues to work in order to pay for his children's education, take home food, and improve his home.

He is applying for a loan in order to make some upgrades to his shop and to buy a barber's chair, because he is thinking of hiring someone in order to grow by small, but sure steps.

loans.use: to fix up his store and to buy a chair so that he can employ one person.

loans.name: Zareena

texts.en:
Zareena is a 41-year-old married woman and the mother of four children. Her husband's income is insufficient to cover all of their household expenses, so she started a milk sales business. She has been in this business for many years and has become famous for providing good quality milk in her locality. She also sells animals on a seasonal basis to generate an extra amount of income to contribute to the family income.

With the support of Kashf Foundation, she has gradually improved her business. Currently, she has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR to purchase another buffalo. This will help her to increase her sales, which will ultimately help in generating more income for her.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo.

loans.name: Irshad

texts.en: Irshad  is 45 years old, married and the mother of four children. In order to help her husband support their family, she went into the business of selling milk and is known in her town for providing good-quality milk. She is happy to help support her family with the income she earns and has requested a loan for 45,000 PKR  to buy another buffalo. Her goal is to increase her income and cover more of the family's daily expenses.

loans.use: to buy another buffalo.

loans.name: Shahnaz

texts.en:
Shahnaz’s husband has successfully established his business operating a donkey cart - with help from the Kashf Foundation and Kiva's lenders. He has become famous in his area for transferring things from one place to another.  

Now Shahnaz's husband needs a larger cart to carry more things and provide his services efficiently.  

For this reason, Shahnaz has taken a 50,000 PKR loan on behalf of her husband. She is positive about her husband’s future earnings and dreams of providing her family with a better standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase a bigger cart for transporting more things.

loans.name: Najma

texts.en:
Najma  is a hard working, 39-year-old married woman with 5 children. She and her husband raise and sell cattle. 

She needs to increase her earnings and requests 45,000 PKR to purchase more cattle. She wants to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase cattle.

loans.name: Fozia

texts.en:
Fozia  is a 35-year-old married woman who has been conducting an animal purchase and sales business with the help of her husband for many years. Her business has provided her family with a decent life. She is the mother of 3 children and is very motivated to provide them a beautiful life with good education, food and clothing.

Fozia has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR. She intends to utilize this loan amount  to purchase more baby goats and calves to cater to more customers. She is hopeful that her business will generate greater revenue in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more baby goats and calves to cater to more customers.

loans.name: Maria Elizabeth

texts.es: Maria de 44 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella posee desde hace 7 años una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia tiene muchos clientes especialmente sus vecinos, con las ventas que realiza logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería como: sopas, huevos, granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, pan dulce, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Maria is 44 years old. She lives in her own house with her husband. For the past 7 years, she has run a small store located in her house. She has many clients, especially her neighbors, and with these sales she has been able to cover some expenses in her house. She is asking for a loan to buy more merchandise such as soups, eggs, basic grains, beverages, candy bars, sweet bread, etc, so she is able to increase her earnings and have a better quality of life.

loans.use: To purchase soups, eggs, basic grains, beverages, candy bars, sweet bread, etc.

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en: Joyce lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with five children, all of whom go to school. She also takes care of additional family members. She operates a stall selling fruit and vegetables. She has been in this business for the last five years. She works seven days a week. She gets additional income from rearing cattle. She has requested for a loan of 200,000 UGX from MCDT – SACCO to buy pineapples, oranges, tomatoes, onions, and cabbages. Her major challenges include seasonality and transportation. Her goal and aspiration is to expand her farming business. She lives in a rented house and the family has access to running water and electricity. Her major monthly expenses include school fees.

loans.use: To buy passion fruit, oranges, tomatoes, onions and cabbages

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is single with one child, who goes to school. She is not looking after any other member of her family.

She has been operating a retail shop for the last ten years, working seven days a week. She does not have any other source of income.

She has requested a loan of UGX 300,000 from MCDT- SACCO to buy beans, flour, sugar and cartons of salt. Her business challenges include collecting money from debtors. Her dream is to increase her sales, so she can attract more customers. She joined MCDT because the organization puts an emphasis on lending to poor women.

She rents a house with access to electricity and piped water.  Her major monthly expenses include school fees and rent.

loans.use: To buy beans, flour, sugar and cartons of salt

loans.name: Tamima

texts.en:
Tamima is a 41-year-old, married mother of six children who, six years ago, started working as a hairdresser from her house to help her husband in covering the needs and expenses of their family.

Tamima is a hard worker and ambitious lady who has a good reputation among her customers. She is trying desperately to develop her business, thus today, she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner, Al Majmoua Lebanese Association for Development, to buy necessary hair tools to provide her customers with better service. 

Tamima hopes to open her own beauty salon in the future, to increase her income and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy necessary hair tools for her business.

loans.name: Najwa

texts.en:
Najwa is a 27-year-old married mother with three children. She requests a loan to pay for her children's  tuition fees. The loan is part of Al Majmoua's Back to School program, designed to finance school expenses such as books, stationery, transportation, and fees for students from low income families. 

Funds can be used for partial or complete payment of school expenses. By supporting this loan, you're enabling access to education for students with limited options. Najwa hopes to continue to provide her children with the necessary living needs, and develop their living standard.

loans.use: to pay for her children's  tuition fees.

loans.name: Gorret

texts.en:
Gorret lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with three children and one of them attends school. She also takes care of additional family members.

For the last ten years, she has operated a food stall at the market. She works seven days a week. She also does some farming and sells the farm produce in order to earn more income. 

She has requested a loan of UGX 200,000 from MCDT- SACCO to buy more irish potatoes, green bananas and onions to sell. Her business challenges include thieves. Her dream is to upgrade from retail to wholesale, supplying other kinds of farm produce from her own farm. She joined MCDT because of its timely loans.

She and her husband live in their own house with access to electricity but no running water.  Her major monthly expenses include school fees and feeding the family.

loans.use: To buy onions, green bananas and irish potatoes

loans.name: Dolores María

texts.es:
EL Grupo De Crédito Calle América se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.
En este lugar vive la señora Dolores, tiene 45 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos, dos de 14 (gemelos) y otro de 6 años  de edad, los dos mayores estudian en colegio y el menor en escuela. Su esposo es albañil.
Doña Dolores es una mujer muy trabajadora que le gusta con trabajar y con sus ingresos ayudarle a su esposo con los gastos del hogar, ella  se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo y bisuterías, su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su  casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes cuando necesitan de alguna prenda, ella sale a recorrer tres días por semana, deja a crédito a sus clientes  y cobra cada quince días. Tiene 9 años que se dedica a esta actividad la cual le da para los gastos de los estudios de sus hijos y en ocasiones para la comida  cuando su esposo no tiene trabajo.
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más bisutería, pantalones, blusas, camisetas y ropa de niños que es lo que más vende en esta época del año. Lleva tres años  en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos ella sale adelante. Sus sueños son tener un bazar.
texts.en:
The Calle América communal bank meets every 15 days in the Montecristi Canton, which is known for its rich pre-colonial culture and crafts, famous both nationally and internationally. It is also known for its famous straw hats.

Dolores, 45, lives here.  She is married and has three children, twins who are 14 years old and a six-year-old. The eldest two go to school, and the youngest is in kindergarten. Her husband is a bricklayer.

Dolores is a very hard working woman who likes to work and help her husband with the household expenses. She sells all kinds of clothing and costume jewelry on a door to door basis. She also sells from home when customers are in need of something. She goes out to sell three times a week and does her transactions on a credit basis, collecting payment every 15 days. For nine years she has been in business, and it has allowed her to cover her children's educational costs. Sometimes she buys the food when her husband is out of work.

This loan is to buy costume jewelry, pants, blouses, t-shirts and children's clothing, which is what she sells most of during this time of year. She has been in the communal bank for three years, and enjoys it because she gets ahead with the loans. Her dream is to have a store.

loans.use: to buy costume jewelry, pants, blouses, t-shirts and children's clothing.

loans.name: Hasan

texts.en:
Hasan is 21 years old. He lives in a village at Jenin city with his mother and two sisters. His life conditions prevented him from completing his education and he is currently working with poultry. He earns around $500 monthly and he has been doing this since 2010.

He needs this youth loan to expand his business. He wants to buy poultry equipment, like cages for producing eggs, build a heating system for the chickens, and buy more chicks. This will help him to improve his financial conditions and will help him support the needs of his family. He will also be able to reinvest in his business

His dream is to educate his sisters and give them the best in life. Hasan is very grateful to everyone who helps him achieve success in his business with this loan.

loans.use: to buy poultry equipment, like cages for producing eggs, build a heating system for the chickens, and buy more chicks which will help him improve his financial condition.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more sheep

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy fertilizers to grow rice

loans.name: Zainabu

texts.en:
Zainabu is a hardworking married woman with two children living in Kamwenge,Uganda.

She is a farmer and earns additional income as a brick layer. Her goal is to become a model farmer in the near future.  Her efforts  are limited by prolonged drought. 

She  requests a loan to hire laborers to clear her land and prepare for the next season.

loans.use: to hire laborers.

loans.name: Livingstone

texts.en:
Livingstone is a married male living in Masindi-Uganda. He raises cattle and sells milk. He started the business to meet his family's needs. He wishes to educate his children .  He is challenged by periods of  prolonged drought when the animals lack water and good pastures.

He needs a loan to buy cows.

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is a hard-working, married man with five children aged 10, 8, 6, 4 and 2. Four of them attend school. He lives in Kamwenge, Uganda.

Samuel owns an electronics shop as his main source of income alongside a salon and takes tenders in his district. He started this business to improve his standard of living. He used his previous loan to buy more screens and phones to sell.

His main hardship is the fake products on the market that are difficult to detect. Samuel will use this loan to buy more items like electronic discs, screens and phones to sell.

loans.use: to buy more items like electronic discs, screens and phones to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pesticides and fertilizer and pay for labor.

loans.name: Agustino

texts.en:
Agustino is a hardworking married father of six children who lives in Kamwenge, Uganda. He is a farmer who also sells produce. He used his previous loan to construct a chicken house and buy chicken feed. 

Agustino's major business hardships are weather changes that hinder his harvesting process, and inadequate capital that prevents him from meeting the increasing needs of both his customers and his poultry operation.

Agustino is requesting a loan to buy farm inputs such as seedlings for the next planting season. His personal dream is to be a modern farmer with fully educated children.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs such as seedlings for the next planting season.

loans.name: Ntungo Tukwatanize Group

texts.en: Teddy is a member of Ntungo Tukwatanize, where members guarantee each other. She is aged thirty-eight and lives with her four children in Fort Portal, Uganda. She sells shoes and at the same time sells fresh foods like cabbages, tomatoes, passion fruit and matooke. She is faced with challenges of customers paying slowly (on delayed payment only) and a lack of a preservative machine to allow her keep her products fresh. However, she has hopes of owning a saloon too in order to make more income. Teddy will use the loan facility to buy more shoes to sell.

loans.use: to buy more shoes to sell.

loans.name: Herbert

texts.en: Herbert is a single, hardworking man who lives in Kamwenge, Uganda. He mostly deals in cattle fattening and sells waragi (a local brew) to earn extra income. He has a vision of having an extended farm of cattle, although bad weather affects the health and output of his animals. He is requesting a loan to buy more cattle feed for his farm.

loans.use: to buy more cattle feed

loans.name: Benjamin

texts.en:
Benjamin is a twenty-seven-year-old, hardworking man living in Kamwenge, Uganda. He is a farmer and also works in a boda boda (motorcycle) transport business to earn extra income. He has a vision of having a big and improved coffee plantation. Weather changes are a major limitation on his business, as they reduce Benjamin's expected returns and lead to constant mechanical issues, which increase expenditure on motorcycle repairs. 

He is requesting a loan to buy farm inputs for his plantation, specifically mulch and fertilizer.

loans.use: to buy mulch and fertilizer for his plantation.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cocoa, rice and beans

loans.name: Rusenyi Obumu Group

texts.en: Expedito is a member of Rusenyi Obumu, where each member guarantees the other. He is aged seventy-two and has seventeen children. He lives in Fort Portal, Uganda. He is a farmer who rears animals and, at the same time, he also sells firewood. Two of his business challenges are workers asking for higher pay which he can't afford and agriculture productivity being low at harvest time. However, he hopes to buy many cattle and add into his farm in order to generate more milk for selling. He has asked for a loan to buy a forest so he can make firewood to sell.

loans.use: to buy a forest and make firewood to sell

loans.name: Yerson Esteban

texts.es:
Yerson, de 29 años, ha optado por montar un negocio de comidas cerca a su casa ubicada en el municipio de Medellín, en este negocio vende productos de panadería
Yerson trabaja todos los días desde las 6 de la mañana hasta la 1 de la tarde con su esposa (ver Foto) es un hombre muy responsable, juicioso y aplicado con su negocio.
Entre sus sueños más latentes esta el poder tener un restaurante en el que ofrezcan distintos tipos de alimentos y puede ofrecer empleos. 

Enfrenta múltiples dificultades como el costo de los insumos, la competencia en el sector y las fuertes lluvias que azotan su puesto de trabajo.
El pide un aliento económico para capitalizar su negocio y comprar un molino eléctrico.
